main.description: An ordered collection of ATProto records. Can reference tracks, albums, artists, other lists, or any record type. The purpose field indicates the intended content type.

purpose.description: The type of content this list contains. Known values indicate common use cases, but any string is valid for extensibility.

items.description: Ordered references to records in this list. Each item is a content-addressable reference (strongRef) to any ATProto record.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the list was created.

listItem.description: A reference to a record within a list. Uses strongRef for content-addressability.

subject.description: Content-addressable reference to the record (uri + cid). The uri indicates the record type (e.g., fm.plyr.track, fm.plyr.list).

addedAt.description: When this item was added to the list.
